name: content_platform_journey_evaluation
description: Test the content platform journey from blog to recipes to breeds

steps.expected: Homepage should load without errors and display chicken farming blog platform with professional design
Blog page should load and display at least 10 high-quality articles about chicken farming
Should display articles covering raising, feeding, housing, and health topics with detailed content
Recipe database should load with 20+ chicken egg recipes and meal planning features
Should display detailed recipes with ingredients, instructions, and meal planning options
Interactive chicken breed selector tool should load with care requirements and recommendations
